component.loader: <0>Design System using the logic of</0> Atomic Design

home.title: A pretty good library <1>of React components for Web application's UI</1>
home.subtitle1: Get started with DS library today with <1>some of these useful resources</1>
home.text: La version stable la plus récente (✓) est recommandée pour une utilisation en production.

promote.title: Ready to use DS library components
promote.text: It includes a comprehensive collection of prebuilt components that are ready for use in production right out of the box, and features a suite of customization options that make it easy to implement your own custom design system on top of our components.

overview.name: overview
overview.description: It includes a comprehensive collection of prebuilt components that are ready for use in production right out of the box, and features a suite of customization options

usage.name: usage
usage.description: Since DS library components are built to function in isolation, they don't require any kind of globally scoped styles

support.name: support
support.description: Learn how to get support for DS library components, including feature requests, bug fixes, and technical support from the team

avatar.name: avatar
avatar.description: Avatars are found throughout material design with uses in everything from tables to dialog menus
avatar.title: Avatar <1>component</1>
avatar.text1: Avatars are found throughout material design with uses in everything from tables to dialog menus.
avatar.text2: Image avatars can be created by passing standard img props src to the component.
avatar.text3: Avatars containing simple characters can be created by passing a string as children.
avatar.text4: For larger or smaller Avatar, use the size prop.

badge.name: badge
badge.description: Badge generates a small badge to the top-right of its children
